title: Local Hour: What's A Quack?
description:
Dan begins the local hour with an essay on Tua Tagovailoa, the NFL's concussion protocol, and our collective response to football's carnage. Then, Jess and Stugotz's young QBs played against each other, Bailey Zappe is a real NFL QB, JJ Watt's heart, and extra innings in baseball. Plus, the crew breaks down what Tyler Herro's contract extension means for the future of the Miami Heat.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
